name: streptococcal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
caused by or relating to streptococcus (= a bacterium, many types of which cause disease): Pneumonia tends to be caused by streptococcal or viral infection. Streptococcal bacteria normally live harmlessly in the human nose and throat. See
streptococcus
More examplesFewer examplesHe was suffering from streptococcal sore throat.The streptococcal antibodies become involved in an autoimmune process. Streptococcal pharyngitis usually appears suddenly with severe sore throat pain.
